name: Feeding Buddy
description:
Be a good Feeding Buddy and provide your little boar with plenty of food! You have ONE Minute to: Pickup Items, aim for your pet boar and SHOOT! Let your boar grow larger than that of the computer! Compete against the Computer in three difficulty levels: Easy, Hard and Insane!

Controls:
W A S D: Move.
E: Pickup Items.
Left Mouse Button: Shoot picked up Items.

This Game was created in and for the GDL - July 2021 Jam.

I hope you have fun playing my little game!!! I didn't get to do all of the stuff I wanted but for my first game ever I'd say this isn't that bad... right?

As for the Models, I used:
Kenney's Food Kit,
this model by Aya Kawa and
this cannon model by Google.
